name: Deceitful, Mythic

sections.body: The bonus on Bluff and Disguise skill checks from Deceitful increases by 2. In addition, you can expend one use of mythic power to treat a Bluff or Disguise check as if you had rolled a natural 20. You must decide to use this ability before making the roll.
sections.name: Benefits

description: Your power to mislead is beyond compare.
